item.title: What is difference between nginx and react server
item.description: Background Once Pankaj Kumar expressed, “What exactly does nginx do?Is it even necessary? How is it different from react server that starts when you run npm run start in the terminal”. Though I have used both of them in the past, I couldn’t exactly answer his question. It is at these moments that you realize that your knowledge is fragile and you don’t have a proper understanding of things. I tried some googling and went through few pages, this was really helpful.
